name: pacific.vim
description:
This is a nice dark color scheme that is meant to be reminiscent of the ocean or the beach, and yet not at all like either the ocean or the beach.

Here are some pictures so you can get an idea what it looks like:
http://www.flickr.com/photos/26471999@N08/2477652644/
http://www.flickr.com/photos/26471999@N08/2476840217/
http://www.flickr.com/photos/26471999@N08/2477652478/
install_details:
On UNIX-like systems, including Mac OS X or Cygwin, put this file into ~/.vim/colors
On Windows, it should go into C:\Program Files\vim(or Vim)\vimfiles\colors (something like that)
